EmailTemplate.name: 17.CloudAA.XLE.webXLE.N.G.N.9898.XLE Gamechanger (Refresh).Email 5 - 9 steps can
EmailTemplate.subject: 9 steps can change the game for your private-hybrid cloud migration
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> A blueprint can change the game for your private-hybrid cloud migration Hi {{lead.First Name:default=edit me}},
If you are thinking about moving to a private-hybrid cloud there’s no reason to do it on your own. A blueprint, based on extensive real-world experience, can guide your every step.
“Stairway to the Cloud”, is a 9-step, best practice, approach to successfully migrate to a private, or private-hybrid cloud, for even the most complex and regulated environments.
Find out how this private cloud architecture provides a solid baseline foundation that can be easily tailored to your needs. To learn more about Nokia IT solutions for large enterprises, visit our OpenStack <[[https://networks.nokia.com/solutions/openstack]]> page.
Sincerely,
Michael Williams | Global Enterprise Marketing | Nokia
U.S. and Canada: +1 866-231-0264 (M-F 8:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. EST)Europe & Asia Pacific: + 44 203 582 5650 (M-F 8:00a.m.- 4:00p.m. GMT)Or use the How to Buy form <[[https://networks.nokia.com/how-to-buy]]> Connect with us © 2017 Nokia.
